archimate:Principle.name: Accreditation
archimate:Principle.documentation: The service an Auditor performs of verifying that a Trust Community Member conforms to the requirements of a Governance Framework. Accreditation involves performing an assessment against relied upon criteria for the benefit of adding reasonable assurance that the assessed party is meeting those criteria.
